title: Shift + Arrow = Pica nudge?
content: Is it possible to manipulate your preferences or shortcuts in InDesign so that shift + arrow nudges 12 PS points instead of 10?
author: Ehague

comments.content:
Hi Eric,

afaik (and in ID4), you cannot change the factor 10 that is triggered by ‘shift’. But you could adjust the value for the arrow itself (Preferences \>Units & Increments); 1.2pt × 10 = 12pt.  
F
